title: my skin was disappeared
body: My  udry spirit guard skin was disappeared.can anyone help me to get it back？RNG Insec J is my name,thank you

replies.body: relog is the  1st d try  if not contact suport
Could you give the link of that?

Since this is an issue with your account's content specifically, we'll need you to reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to dive deeper and take a better look into this that way.

Let me know if you have any questions.
